# Define target name
set (TARGET_NAME FMT)

# Define source files
file (GLOB CPP_FILES fmt/*.cc)
file (GLOB H_FILES fmt/*.h)

set (SOURCE_FILES ${CPP_FILES} ${H_FILES})

# Define dependency libs
set (INCLUDE_DIRS .)

# Setup target
setup_library ()

# Install headers for building and using the Urho3D library (install dependency for Urho3D/Physics/PhysicsWorld.h, Urho3D/Physics/RigidBody.h, and Urho3D/Physics/PhysicsUtils.h)
install_header_files (DIRECTORY fmt/ DESTINATION ${DEST_INCLUDE_DIR}/ThirdParty/fmt FILES_MATCHING PATTERN *.h)  # Note: the trailing slash is significant
